rules_text:
Flying, first strike
[i]Ladyblade[/i] – Whenever another creature enters under your control, Palla, Kind Eldest Sister gets +1/+1 until end of turn, and you gain 1 life.
[i]Sisterhood[/i] – If you control a creature named Est and a creature named Catria, Pegasi you control get +2/+2 and can't be blocked by creatures with reach.
